page.title: 02Hermitage Farm Wadborough 1.
page.content: The land coverage around Hermitage Farm is fields. Mr Lole partly rents the farm, he grows crops such as Beans, peas, wheat (Durum) and oil seed rape, he has approximately 220 hectares. He has 30 hectares of beans. He stores the beans in big iron bins. He grows 20 hectares of peas. He also needs fertilizer for his crops. Mr Lole uses a{Rotation}for his crops, if he plants beans in one field and it takes all the goodness out of the soil, he will then plant grass there to put the goodness back into the soil. So a{Rotation}is an important job. He grows 15 hectares of Durum (wheat).The ground is good enough for Durum (wheat) but it also needs fertilizer. He has to plant that before Christmas, he puts the fertilizer on later in the year.
